## SDQ vs EPQ

When it comes to behavioral and personality assessment, two key instruments often utilized by psychologists and social scientists are the Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire (SDQ) and The Eysenck Personality Questionnaire (EPQ). The analysis, comparison, and harmonization of these instruments could be both arduous and time-consuming. Harmony, a software tool designed for psychologists, simplifies this process. Underlining the similarities and differences between **SDQ vs EPQ**, it provides a percentage match between each item, allowing for an efficient and accurate comparative analysis. Harmony leverages advanced natural language processing and generative AI technology to automate harmonization and comparison of questionnaire items. It's an essential tool when working on harmonizing **SDQ vs EPQ**. Not only does Harmony eliminate the tedious task of manually going through lengthy PDF questionnaires, but it also enables a multilingual comparison. Users can easily select from pre-existing instruments in Harmony's database or upload their own in PDF format, providing flexibility and convenience in the process. The importance of the comparison between **SDQ vs EPQ** is undeniable in advancing psychological and social science research. The repeated longitudinal analysis these studies advocate requires efficient and accurate toolsets. Utilize Harmony's innovative technology to streamline your research process, reduce subjective bias, and ensure accuracy in your **SDQ vs EPQ** comparison and harmonization tasks. Visit [Harmony's web interface](https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app) to kickstart your comparative analysis today.

## Compare the items in SDQ and EPQ

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#__In1dfV0=" target="harmonyapp">Import SDQ and EPQ into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#__In1dfV0=" target="harmonyapp">Import just SDQ into Harmony</a> - compare SDQ with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#__In1dfV0=" target="harmonyapp">Import just EPQ into Harmony</a> - compare EPQ with other instruments
